Notes

[l408779] first pressing, NO Warner Communications logo in rimtext. Issued with lyric inner sleeve. Recorded at Atlantic Recording Studios, New York, New York, and at Criteria Sound Studios, Miami, Florida. AWB would like to express their deep appreciation to Jerry Wexler, Alan Pariser and Bruce McCaskill.
